attractions.name: Great Pyramids of Giza
attractions.description: The iconic pyramids of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

attractions.name: Karnak Temple
attractions.description: Large complex of ancient temples and monuments in Luxor.

attractions.name: Salah El-Din Citadel
attractions.description: Historic medieval Islamic fortification in Cairo with panoramic city views.

attractions.name: Egyptian Museum
attractions.description: Home to an extensive collection of ancient Egyptian antiquities.

attractions.name: Marina Beach
attractions.description: Popular Alexandria seaside area and beach promenade.

attractions.name: Valley of the Queens
attractions.description: Ancient royal burial ground for the queens of Egypt near Luxor.

attractions.name: Abu Simbel Temples
attractions.description: Rock-cut temples of Ramses II relocated to save them from flooding.

attractions.name: Khan El Khalili Bazaar
attractions.description: Historic souk in Islamic Cairo known for spices, crafts and antiques.

attractions.name: Valley of the Kings
attractions.description: Famous necropolis of pharaonic rulers on the Nile's west bank.

attractions.name: Mortuary Temple of Hatshepsut
attractions.description: Temple of the female pharaoh Hatshepsut at Deir el-Bahari.

attractions.name: Temple of Philae
attractions.description: Island temple complex dedicated to goddess Isis, accessible by boat.

attractions.name: Temple of Kom Ombo
attractions.description: Unique double temple dedicated to Sobek and Horus.

attractions.name: Nubian Museum
attractions.description: Museum showcasing Nubian culture, artifacts and history.

attractions.name: Museum of Islamic Art
attractions.description: Houses one of the world's most important collections of Islamic art.

attractions.name: National Museum of Egyptian Civilization
attractions.description: Modern museum covering Egyptian history from prehistoric to present day.

attractions.name: Alexandria National Museum
attractions.description: Museum showcasing Alexandria's Greco-Roman and Egyptian heritage.

attractions.name: Maspero Museum
attractions.description: Museum focusing on Egypt's archaeological finds and history.

attractions.name: Ras Mohammed National Park
attractions.description: Renowned marine reserve with world-class diving and coral reefs.

attractions.name: Dahab Beach
attractions.description: Laid-back Red Sea town known for diving and relaxed beaches.

attractions.name: Red Sea (Hurghada)
attractions.description: Popular Red Sea resort destination with beaches and diving spots.

attractions.name: Wadi El Rayan
attractions.description: Protected area with waterfalls, lakes and desert landscapes near Faiyum.

attractions.name: Ain Sokhna Beach
attractions.description: Popular beach destination near Cairo with resorts and water sports.

attractions.name: El Gouna Beach
attractions.description: Upscale resort town on the Red Sea with lagoons and beaches.
attractions.price: Free to enter (Paid beach access varies)

attractions.name: Western Desert Safari
attractions.description: Desert safaris and oases adventures in Egypt's Western Desert.

attractions.name: Diving in Ras Mohammed
attractions.description: World-class diving site with coral reefs and abundant marine life.

attractions.name: Sandboarding in Ain Sokhna
attractions.description: Sandboarding on desert dunes close to the Red Sea coast.

attractions.name: Camel Riding near the Pyramids
attractions.description: Traditional camel rides in the Giza desert with pyramid views.

attractions.name: Nile Kayaking
attractions.description: Kayaking and small-boat activities on the Nile River in Cairo.

attractions.name: Hot Air Balloon Ride (Luxor)
attractions.description: Sunrise balloon flights over the Valley of the Kings and Luxor landscape.

attractions.name: Dream Park
attractions.description: Large amusement park with rides and family attractions.

attractions.name: Alexandria Aquarium
attractions.description: Aquarium showcasing Mediterranean and Red Sea marine life.

attractions.name: Al-Azhar Park
attractions.description: Large green park in Cairo with panoramic views over the old city.

attractions.name: Giza Zoo
attractions.description: Historic zoo home to a variety of animals and family-friendly attractions.

attractions.name: KidZania Cairo
attractions.description: Indoor educational entertainment center for children with role-play activities.

attractions.name: Magic Planet (Mall of Egypt)
attractions.description: Indoor family entertainment center with games and rides.

attractions.name: Pharaonic Village
attractions.description: Living museum recreating ancient Egyptian life and activities.

attractions.name: Opera House Music Festivals
attractions.description: Cultural music events and performances at Cairo Opera House.

attractions.name: Handicraft Workshops (Luxor)
attractions.description: Local workshops offering traditional crafts and souvenirs.

attractions.name: Al-Azhar Mosque
attractions.description: One of Cairo's oldest and most significant mosques, known for its architecture and historical importance.

attractions.name: Hanging Church
attractions.description: Famous Coptic church suspended above a gatehouse of the Babylon Fortress in Old Cairo.

attractions.name: Muhammad Ali Mosque (Alabaster Mosque)
attractions.description: Prominent mosque inside the Cairo Citadel known for its alabaster walls.

attractions.name: Saint Catherine's Monastery
attractions.description: Ancient monastery at the foot of Mount Sinai with religious significance.

attractions.name: Coptic Orthodox Church (St. Mark - Alexandria)
attractions.description: Important Coptic cathedral with historical significance in Alexandria.

attractions.name: Temple of Hathor (Dendera)
attractions.description: Well-preserved Greco-Roman and Pharaonic temple complex dedicated to Hathor.

attractions.name: Abu Serga Church
attractions.description: Historic Coptic church in Old Cairo, reputedly built on the site where the Holy Family rested.

attractions.name: Mosque of Ibn Tulun
attractions.description: One of the oldest mosques in Cairo, featuring a distinctive spiral minaret.

attractions.name: Sultan Hassan Mosque
attractions.description: Majestic Mamluk-era mosque near the Citadel, known for its monumental architecture.

attractions.name: Al-Refa'i Mosque
attractions.description: Royal mosque and mausoleum with elaborate architecture and tombs of modern Egyptian royals.

attractions.name: Al-Hussein Mosque
attractions.description: Important religious site in Islamic Cairo, associated with Imam Hussein.

attractions.name: Al-Muizz Street (Historic mosques & sites)
attractions.description: Historic medieval street with many mosques, madrassas and monuments in Islamic Cairo.

attractions.name: Al-Hakim Mosque
attractions.description: Historical Fatimid mosque with a distinctive façade in Old Cairo.

attractions.name: Al-Mursi Abu al-Abbas Mosque
attractions.description: Famous mosque on Alexandria's Corniche with striking architecture.

attractions.name: Mosque of Amr ibn al-As
attractions.description: The first mosque built in Egypt and a historic landmark in Fustat.

attractions.name: Sidi Gaber Mosque
attractions.description: Historic neighborhood mosque in Alexandria.

attractions.name: Zaghloul Mosque (Rosetta / Rashid)
attractions.description: Local historic mosque in the Nile Delta town of Rashid.

attractions.name: Sidi Abdel Rahman Mosque
attractions.description: Seaside mosque and landmark popular with visitors to Matrouh.

attractions.name: Felucca Ride on the Nile
attractions.description: Traditional wooden felucca boats offering peaceful Nile cruises.

attractions.name: Coffee House Scene (Representative)
attractions.description: Traditional Egyptian coffeehouse atmosphere representing local culture.

attractions.name: Local Market Scene (Representative)
attractions.description: Representative local market scenes (stalls, spices, crafts) commonly found in Egypt.

attractions.name: Temple of Hathor (Dendera)
attractions.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Hathor with well-preserved reliefs and columns.

attractions.name: Grand Egyptian Museum (GEM)
attractions.description: The world's largest archaeological museum, featuring King Tut's full collection.

attractions.name: Qaitbay Citadel
attractions.description: A 15th-century defensive fortress located on the Mediterranean sea coast.

attractions.name: Luxor Temple
attractions.description: A large ancient Egyptian temple complex located on the east bank of the Nile River.

attractions.name: Bibliotheca Alexandrina
attractions.description: The major library and cultural center built to commemorate the ancient Library of Alexandria.

attractions.name: Wadi Degla Protectorate
attractions.description: A natural protected area perfect for hiking, cycling, and enjoying desert wildlife.

attractions.name: Colossi of Memnon
attractions.description: Two massive stone statues of Pharaoh Amenhotep III.

attractions.name: Coptic Museum
attractions.description: A museum dedicated to Coptic art and history in Egypt.

attractions.name: Blue Hole
attractions.description: A world-famous diving and snorkeling site, known as a natural sinkhole.

attractions.name: Aswan High Dam
attractions.description: An embankment dam built across the Nile in Aswan, completed in 1970.

attractions.name: Ben Ezra Synagogue
attractions.description: A historic synagogue and an important religious landmark in Coptic Cairo.

attractions.name: Siwa Oasis
attractions.description: A historical oasis known for its dates, olive groves, and unique local culture.

attractions.name: Mount Sinai / Mount Moses
attractions.description: A mountain of great religious importance, popular for sunrise climbs.

attractions.name: Catacombs of Kom El Shoqafa
attractions.description: A historical necropolis blending Roman, Greek, and Ancient Egyptian cultural features.

attractions.name: Colored Canyon
attractions.description: A stunning rock formation, popular for hiking and exploring colorful desert geology.

attractions.name: Baron Empain Palace
attractions.description: An architectural masterpiece in Heliopolis, recently restored and open to the public.

hotels.name: Almasa Hotel
hotels.description: Al Masah Hotel and Spa features a terrace with a swimming pool. In the green area of Nasr City, it includes 5 restaurants and a spa center. All the elegant rooms have a balcony.

hotels.name: Hilton Hotel
hotels.description: Enjoy a luxurious stay at the Hilton Heliopolis, featuring world-class amenities, multiple pools, and exquisite dining options in the heart of Cairo.

hotels.name: Cairo Marriott Hotel
hotels.description: Experience Royal courtesy at the Cairo Marriott Hotel & Omar Khayyam Casino. Located in the lively Zamalek district, surrounded by 6 acres of palace gardens.

hotels.name: Sheraton Cairo
hotels.description: Rising on the banks of the Nile, Sheraton Cairo Hotel & Casino offers effortless service and modern accommodations with stunning views of the river.

hotels.name: Four Seasons at Nile Plaza
hotels.description: In the heart of Cairo on the banks of the Nile, Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza opens the door to discovering Egypt’s ancient mysteries and modern excitement.

hotels.name: Kempinski Nile Hotel
hotels.description: Kempinski Nile Hotel Garden City Cairo offers guests a boutique five-star experience on the banks of the Nile River.
